title: LFT Wanting to start a ranked team
body:
I want to starts semi-serious ranked team and get to know each and everyone of you better and discuss league.
Must have Skype to communicate and possibly teamspeak.
Layout and my info
IGN: Riso
Age: 14
Highest rank achieved: Bronze 2
Normal wins: About 240
Main Role: Support, Mid, Top
Worst Role: Adc
Skype: Yes
Teamspeak: Yes

Possibly higher ranking, for in-depth discussions or a sub, possibly even coaches
